data.name: El Minero
data.detailed_description:
El Minero


Explore, jump and hop inside an underground mine in this 2d hand drawn platformer.

Not looking for treasure nor ghosts nor idols.
It's just your day job, full of danger and exploration.
Try heavy duty machinery to solve short platforming puzzles.
Be careful of the environment.
Nothing is out to kill you, but accidents can happen.

Bespoke soundtrack by Tokyo Based Music Producer gh0stpops.
Hand drawn Graphics in the style of Mexican "moneros" (cartoonists).
Environment Inspired by stories and experiences of real miners.
Beginner friendly, laid back experience for all ages.

data.short_description: A laid back 2D Platformer game based on the unsung daily lives of miners.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or better
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @3Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel or M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 or higher
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux (64-bit x86)
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU @3Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 or higher
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
